pullrequest.title: Apply gamma correction when Scene3D engine is set to ogre2

content.raw:
yeah I noticed that. The objects are not very well lit due to a directional light bug which should be fixed with this [bugfix](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/123/fix-ogre2-light-direction-when-pose/diff)

Still with the fix, the objects appear darker due to differences in the way ogre 2.1 does shading and lighting. In this [post](https://forums.ogre3d.org/viewtopic.php?t=82826#p515046), the ogre devs recommend doing some tuning when migrating to ogre2. I may have to change a few default params in ogre2 if we want the look and feel to be consistent with ogre 1.x. I can play around with that.
